title: Our Founder - Fr. Peter Marie Mermier
biography: Fr. Peter Marie Mermier (1790â€“1862) was a French priest and the founder of the Missionaries of St. Francis de Sales (MSFS). Deeply moved by the spiritual needs of his time, he dedicated his life to missions, education, and the renewal of Christian life.
vision: Fr. Mermier believed in the power of education and missionary work to transform society. His vision led to the establishment of institutions focused on holistic education, a legacy that continues to thrive today.
